org.exolab.jms.config
Class AttributeExpander

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.exolab.jms.config.AttributeExpander
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.exolab.castor.xml.EventProducer
public class AttributeExpander
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.exolab.castor.xml.EventProducer

This class expands attributes in XML documents as the document is being parsed. It is designed to be used in conjunction with the Castor unmarshalling framework.

To be expanded, attribute values must contain text of the form ${property.name}, where property.name is a property returned by System.getProperty().
If no property exists, the attribute value remains unchanged.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $ $Date: 2003/08/17 01:32:22 $
Author:
Tim Anderson
